question: A maintenance worker has to clean a office building with 120 floors. They have 5 days to get it done. It takes them 10 minutes per floor. If they work 14 hours each day, what percentage of their day, on average, is spent cleaning floors?
answer:
They have to clean 24 floors a day because 120 / 5 = <<120/5=24>>24
They spend 240 minutes cleaning per day because 24*10 = <<24*10=240>>240
They spend 4 hours a day because 240 / 60 = <<240/60=4>>4
They spend 2/7 of their day cleaning floors because 4 / 14 = <<4/14=0.2857142857142857>>0.2857142857142857
They spend 28% of their day cleaning floors because 0.2857142857142857*100 = <<0.2857142857142857*100=28>>28
#### 28
